column2: Please note that fields marked with an asterisk (*) must be filled in.

Are there any other services you may wish to undertake with the University?
In order to publish the alumni magazine we need your news! Tell us what youâre doing - please enter below anything which you feel may be of interest to the University and fellow alumni:

column1: <table width="100%" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" id="8" class="MNorm">

Under the terms of the 1998 Data Protection Act, your data is securely held in the Communications Centre and is treated confidentially. The data is available to our faculties, academic Schools and administrative departments, and is used for a full range of alumni activities, including alumni relations mailings, the promotion of benefits and services available to alumni, notification of alumni events, networking and development and for feedback on the value of our courses. In addition, we are obliged to pass contact details to the Higher Education Statistics Agency and its sub-contractor for the purposes of the Destination of Leavers from Higher Education survey. If you object to the use of your data for any of the above purposes, please contact the Alumni Relations Office.
